page.title: 13Mechanisation in farming
page.content: The farms in this area are efficiently worked by{families}employing 1 or 2 others. There has been a great increase in{mechanisation}in the last 40 years. (see page on Change) There is a local Agricultural Contractor, who amongst other things, does combine harvesting work but some farmers do the necessary work themselves. All have at least 1 tractor and most have a landrover. Most have errected large storage barns over recent years. Many farms accomodate{tourists}and supply milk, cream and eggs. In the immediate vicinity a working farm has specially adapted his milking parlour so that the general public can watch milking in progress.
